com.maddox.sas1946.il2.util

Class Conversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maddox.sas1946.il2.util.Conversion

  • public class Conversion
extends java.lang.Object
    "Conversion" Class of the "SAS Common Utils"

    This Class is used to provide different type conversions which are not available in Java 1.3 by default.

    Since:
    1.0.3
    Version:
    1.0.6
    Author:
    SAS~Storebror

    • Method Detail

      • longFromTwoInts

        public static final long longFromTwoInts(int highInt,
                                         int lowInt)
        Generates a long value from two given int values. The first int parameter defines the "high" portion of the generated long value, the second int parameter defines the "low" portion of the generated long value
        Parameters:
        highInt - the "high" portion of the generated long value
        lowInt - the "low" portion of the generated long value
        Returns:
        a long value generated from the given int values
        Since:
        1.0.3

      • highIntFromLong

        public static final int highIntFromLong(long theLong)
        Extracts the "high" portion int value of the given long value
        Parameters:
        theLong - the long value whichs "high" portion int value shall be extracted
        Returns:
        the "high" portion int value of the given long value
        Since:
        1.0.3

      • lowIntFromLong

        public static final int lowIntFromLong(long theLong)
        Extracts the "low" portion int value of the given long value
        Parameters:
        theLong - the long value whichs "low" portion int value shall be extracted
        Returns:
        the "low" portion int value of the given long value
        Since:
        1.0.3
